content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll start by setting specific goals for my practice schedule, like perfecting my salsa footwork and mastering a new hip hop routine. I'll also make sure to prioritize my practice sessions and allocate my most productive time slots for dance practice. I'll definitely use a planner or app to stay organized and on track. Do you have any advice on how to stay motivated and avoid burnout while following a practice schedule?
